net.explorviz.settings.services

Class AuthorizationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.explorviz.settings.services.AuthorizationService

  • @Service
public class AuthorizationService
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles authorization.

    • Method Detail

      • isSameUser

        public boolean isSameUser(java.lang.String id,
                          java.lang.String authHeader)
        Checks whether the given user id matches to the one given in the auth header.
        Parameters:
        id - user id
        authHeader - authorization header
        Returns:
        if and only if the user id is the same as the id given in the authorization header

      • isAdmin

        public boolean isAdmin(java.lang.String authHeader)
        Checks whether the token belongs to a user with admin role.
        Parameters:
        authHeader - authorization header
        Returns:
        if and only if the list of roles in the token contains the admin right
